name: At The Window
description:
(TW : gunshots, and eating sounds)

The music bug in Firefox, I suggest using Chrome  for the full experience !

At The Window 🥧

Eat like it's 1926  (and as a perfectly sized bird) ! Don't get caught by the residents, they have a weird tendency to look at the window, they are slightly paranoid maybe for good reasons. 

This game was made in 2 weeks for the Gaming Like It's 1926 game jam, I used copyright free images from mostly 1900 to 1930. It was a lot of fun, and I hope you have fun too !

(my french is showing on the third screenshot)

Musics : 

  • Trrr by Crowander
  • Aux Puces No 2, Dix-Neuf cent trente, and La première page by Circus Marcus

(Please go check their works, it's amazing)

Sound from Freesound and Léa (merci encore)

All images are from Internet Archive Book Images
